content: crochet sea turtle amigurumi pattern this pattern is available for free on my blog - www loopsandlovecrochet com here you are paying to purchase an ad-free version of this crochet pattern with some additional photos and tips/tricks this listing is for the pdf crochet pattern for a sea turtle amigurumi and the mini sea turtle amigurumi you ll get the pdf file for both of these crochet patterns **sea turtle amigurumi** - finished size approx 6 5 inches from head to tail **mini sea turtle amigurumi** - finished size approx 4 5 inches from head to tail this pdf pattern includes step-by-step instructions with lots of photos which makes it easy to follow and also beginner friendly but still fun for more experienced crocheter i hope you enjoy making this little turtle as much as i did materials worsted weight yarn approx 60 -
